tool_description: Send unlimited SMS to any Indian mobile number using this API, all you need is an account from freesms8.co.in
name: FreeSMS8
title: FreeSMS8

api_list.name: Send SMS

required_parameters.name: pwd
required_parameters.description: Password of the account registered on freesms8

required_parameters.name: phone
required_parameters.description: Recipients 10-digit phone numbers separated by semicolon

required_parameters.name: msg
required_parameters.description: Message to be sent as SMS
